My academic focus doesn't directly inform my decision in this simple allocation game, however. The distribution I choose won't advance or hinder my scholarly pursuits. Since the choice has no effect on me, and I have no knowledge of Person A, there's no reason to intentionally choose the option that gives them less. I will choose the option that maximizes Person A's outcome, given my own is unaffected.
